description:
Select lines between the dots in an attempt to make boxes. When you complete a box, your selected avatar will appear inside it and you will get another turn. Try to complete more boxes than the Touchpad [ Curious George] :) to win!

How to Play:
Change the Background of the game or Avatar [ which presents you] by tapping the background and avatar icon on the right side of the screen.Click on the Begin Button on the right side of the screen.Select lines between the dots to make squares When you complete a box, your avatar (image) will appear inside the boxin which means that you have occupied the box and you will get another turn to play
If George [Touchpad] occupies a box, then image of the George will be displayed,Try to occupy more boxes than the George and win the game.
